Harness Error. harness_status.status = 1 , harness_status.message = Uncaught InvalidStateError: Failed to execute 'stop' on 'MediaRecorder': The MediaRecorder's state is 'inactive'.
PASS Verify that drawing to a 2D canvas that is not attached to the DOM dispatches frames to an attached MediaRecorder.
